entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [browser] Oveprotective MT assert breaking fair usage in unit tests #92853
  • NativeAot isinst branch trimming #92850
  • `entry` name for `TarReader.GetNextEntry().Name` formatted incorrectly for UstarTarEntry #92847
  • Remove the `add_linker_flag` function and instead use `target_link_options` #92843

Closed

  • Math.Round fails on 0.50 value #92849
  • IParsable<'T> is not referentially transparent for DateTimeOffset with InvariantCulture #92851
  • Assertion failed 'regArgTab[argNum].slot == 2' #83167
    8.0.0
  • Should `JIT_UpdateWriteBarrierState` be in the patchable section or not? #92554
    Future
  • Include info about system call errors in exceptions from creating/opening a named mutex #89090
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Merge stores #92852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Minimal ILGenerator implementation for new AssemblyBuilder.Save #92846
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Use specific version of v8 with runtime tests #92845
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use `add_linker_options` and `target_linker_options` in cmake #92844
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • Include info about system call errors in some exceptions from operating on named mutexes #92603
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Use specific version of v8 for tests #91633
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update targetingpacks.targets #88991
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: fix self-conflicting HFA arg prolog handling for arm64 #92355
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Split off patched code into separate .S file and disable subsections-via-symbols for it #92555
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove fgUpdateFlowGraph from optOptimizeFlow #92839
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix JsonDocument thread safety. #92832
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix JsonDocument thread safety. #92831
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.x
  • Allow multiple post-build steps and allow templated pre and post-build steps #92375
    area-Infrastructure
  • Throw exception in TensorPrimitives for unsupported span overlaps #92838
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors

Updated

  • Convert all remaining tests in the Loader subtree to the merged model #92407
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Clean up the crossgen2_publish project and local/live packs references #92826
    area-Infrastructure
  • [linux-bionic] Skip failing NTLM tests #92830
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Call UpdateChangedFlowGraph after ifConversion #92821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Fix WasmLinkIcalls and WasmNativeStrip support. #91843
    area-Build-mono
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Reorder indirs on arm64 to make them amenable to ldp optimization #92768
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Native AOT publish ignores `DebugType=portable` #35798

PullRequests

Merged

  • Don't add implicit package references when downloads have been disabled. #35796
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Parse -d command differently based on position #35492
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Open issues for collection expression construction #7542
  • Simple encoding of unions in C# #7544

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler crashes on unreachable code in exception filter with pattern matching in Release configuration only #70200
  • VB Hot Reload bug #70198

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize `T? ?? <constant>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<constant>)` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: optimize List<T> construction #70197
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions

Merged

  • Include a BuildHost.deps.json when packaging the language server #70196
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Properly parse members in type declarations missing an identifier #69798
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: analyze nullability of element assignments #70192
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Update 'use collection expression' analyzer/fixer to support conversion when a capacity argument is passed. #70193
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add ReferenceOutputAssembly="false" to language server dlls we don't ship #70195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide a mechanism for rendering Blazor pages statically even when the app is set up for interactive rendering #51046
  • Support DateOnly with InputDate #51045
  • NotFound RenderFragment ignore in .Net 8 Blazor Web App? #51044
  • Formalize coding style guideline for attribute placement #51043
  • Blazor Server - NavigationManager push to history #51042
  • Create server rendered forms with client validation using Blazor without a circuit #51040
  • New blazor wasm hosted project add container orchestrator support debugging doesn't work. #51038
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, updates #51037
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Grpc.Swagger Can't Deserialze Enum #51036
  • [Feature] Async version of `IWebHostBuilder.ConfigureServices` #51035

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #51007
  • Access an RCL's static assets from an RCL Library in a Blazor WASM #51002
  • Blazor SSR StreamRendering re-renders last few elements. #50891

PullRequests

Updated

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix Blazor WebAssembly PWA empty template #51032
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2280743 #50997
    area-mvc
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-mvc, area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Fix failing Kestrel test due to Pings #51034
    * NO MERGE *, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-30
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the symstore dependency from Microsoft.Diagnostics.DebugServices #4279

Merged

  • Update SOS to show the relevant information for the !ThreadPool command when using the Windows thread pool #4160
    auto-merge
  • Fix build breaks #4276

Updated

  • Add the "crashinfo" command for NativeAOT. #4125

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Editor is severely broken on iOS: (1) Does not auto-scroll down as new lines are added past max height, (2) Does not respond to touch to manually scroll down/up, (3) Causes visible frame lag in resizing parents when it resizes #17757
  • Binding a text property to the Label affects the scrolling performance on mac #17755
  • Nested Border's misbehave on iOS #17753
  • How to make status bar transparent for Modal Pages #17752

Closed

  • There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'android-arm64 #17725

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't run hide on tapped code if window is null #17758
  • Improves Bindable SetValue performance #17756
    community ✨
  • Correctly expand rows/columns when grid padding #17750
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17749
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, Under Consideration
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    .NET 8 SR1
